newsitem.title: USA: Bowater to redeem convertible pfd stock.
newsitem.headline: Bowater to redeem convertible pfd stock.

text.p: Bowater Inc said Monday it was calling for redemption on January 9 its 7.0 percent PRIDES, Series B convertible preferred stock with a par value of $1 per share.
The PRIDES will be redeemed at a ratio of 0.82 common share for each PRIDE, Bowater said.
The 4.9 million outstanding PRIDES will be redeemed for about 4.0 million Bowater common shares, the company said. Cash will be paid in lieu of fractional shares.

From the start, PRIDES have been counted as common stock equivalents on a one-for-one basis to calculate fully diluted earnings per share. Conversion would therefore be accretive to fully-diluted earnings, the company said.
